name: smugglers-town-monorepo
description: Smuggler's Town AI Game - Client and Server

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "UTILS,SCHEMAS,SERVER,CLIENT" -c "auto" "pnpm --filter @smugglers-town/shared-utils build --watch" "pnpm --filter @smugglers-town/shared-schemas build --watch" "pnpm --filter smugglers-town-server dev" "pnpm --filter smugglers-town-client dev"
